text: ok Share me the cases if you find out. I will dig to see what we can improve there.

I added you to the <#CBXTNHPEZ|related-posts-module> channel, there is also this here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Listing-related-blog-post-articles/m-p/270479/highlight/false#M12276>

:bulb:Something that is def needed is the ability when removing an employee from your portal to also have the choice of "Remove this employee from all assigned portals" With a listing of all the portals the employee is on. Also need a way to show portals they are on in the "Users" area.

Added to ideas:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Partner-Portals-should-include-what-other-portals-a-user-is/idi-p/271971#M35303>
but this is how i plan to wreak havoc when i am fired :disappointed:
Well as it sits now... you could... as I am noticing older employees on some of the portals we work on :shocked_face_with_exploding_head:

Marketplace team seeing as all the investments you guys are making in local development, and how thereâ€™s no JSON version of drag n drop templates via FTP
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/resources/what-are-the-submission-requirements-for-the-template-marketplace#1-2>

I think it would make sense to remove this rule.
